detaileddescription.para: SW Unit testing is accomplished through SWATT. The test cases are based on this design. For details please refer the chapter Module (Unit) Test Level in DMTP. Expected test coverage (100%) and type of test coverage (C1).

sect1.title: Verification of Resource Consumption
sect1.para:

The measured value can be found in https://mspe.conti.de/projects/DG-054944/Project%20Documents/110%20Engineering/040%20Software%20Engineering/040%20SW%20Architecture%20+%20Concept/020%20ST%20CHORUS/020%20Resource%20Allocation/Reports/

sect1.title: Verification by Review
sect1.para: The review is available in git. Any points linked to JIRA tickes.

sect1.title: Verification by Testing
sect1.para: The functions of OBDLocking are tested automatically by a SWATT test. The test is present under .../c/test/swut sub-directory.
